user.title: CoinMarketCap Configuration
user.description: Configure your CoinMarketCap integration. Need an API Key? Get one for free at [pro.coinmarketcap.com](https://pro.coinmarketcap.com/account/).

data_description.api_key: Your personal Pro API Key from the CoinMarketCap developer portal.
data_description.symbols: Enter the symbols you want to track, separated by commas (e.g., BTC,ETH,SOL).
data_description.scan_interval: How often the data should be refreshed in seconds (Minimum 60s, recommended 300s).
data_description.decimals: Number of decimal places for prices and percentage changes.
data_description.show_sensors: Select which data points you want to see. Global metrics and API usage are shared across all symbols.

init.title: CoinMarketCap Settings
init.description: Update your CoinMarketCap configuration and tracking preferences.

data_description.api_key: Your Pro API Key (find it at pro.coinmarketcap.com)
data_description.scan_interval: Interval in seconds between API updates (e.g., 300 = 5 minutes)
data_description.decimals: Number of decimal places to display (e.g., 2)
data_description.currency: Preferred currency for valuation (e.g., USD or EUR)
data_description.show_sensors: Choose which data points you want to see for each symbol

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate
reauth_confirm.description: Your API Key is no longer valid. Please enter a new one.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to CoinMarketCap API
